fr.formation.utils

Class ComputeAmortization

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.formation.utils.ComputeAmortization

  • class ComputeAmortization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims at providing static mathematical functions needed for computation of an amortization table.
    Author:
    Philippe AMICE

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.math.MathContext mc
      MathContext object used many times in this class for calculations on BigDecimal

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static java.math.BigDecimal insurance(java.math.BigDecimal capital, java.math.BigDecimal rate, long duration)
      static method to compute amount of insurance for this payment.
      (package private) static java.math.BigDecimal interests(java.math.BigDecimal remainingK, java.math.BigDecimal rate)
      static method to compute amount of interest for a given payment.
      (package private) static java.math.BigDecimal payoff(java.math.BigDecimal loanAmount, java.math.BigDecimal rate, long duration, int coeff)
      static method to compute the payoff for this payment (amount * rate / duration).
      (package private) static java.math.BigDecimal periodRate(java.math.BigDecimal rate, long period)
      static method to compute the rate for the relevant period (i.e. the rate of the loan itself for annual amortization, or the loan rate divided by 12 months).
      (package private) static java.math.BigDecimal principal(java.math.BigDecimal payoff, java.math.BigDecimal interests)
      static method to compute amount of capital repaid.

      static method to compute the remaining capital to be repaid.
      (package private) static java.math.BigDecimal totalCost(java.math.BigDecimal payoff, java.math.BigDecimal insurance)
      static method to compute total cost of this payment (amount of capital repaid + interest + insurance contribution)

    • Method Detail

      • periodRate

        static java.math.BigDecimal periodRate(java.math.BigDecimal rate,
                                       long period)
        static method to compute the rate for the relevant period (i.e. the rate of the loan itself for annual amortization, or the loan rate divided by 12 months).
        Parameters:
        rate - interest rate of the loan
        period - period covered by the payment
        Returns:
        interest rate for the relevant period

      • payoff

        static java.math.BigDecimal payoff(java.math.BigDecimal loanAmount,
                                   java.math.BigDecimal rate,
                                   long duration,
                                   int coeff)
        static method to compute the payoff for this payment (amount * rate / duration). here is detail of the different variables used to compute the payoff _____ => final computation +-------comp1------+/+-------------comp4-------------+____________________ => compute components for the final computation +-------comp1------+____+---comp2----+_+----comp3---+ (Capital*taux/Coeff)/(1-(1+Taux/Coeff)^(-Duree*Coeff))
        Parameters:
        loanAmount - amount of the loan
        rate - interest rate of the loan
        duration - duration of the loan in years
        coeff - 1 for annual amortization table, 12 for monthly
        Returns:
        the payoff

      • interests

        static java.math.BigDecimal interests(java.math.BigDecimal remainingK,
                                      java.math.BigDecimal rate)
        static method to compute amount of interest for a given payment.
        Parameters:
        remainingK - remaining capital
        rate - rate of the loan
        Returns:
        amount of interest for this payment

      • principal

        static java.math.BigDecimal principal(java.math.BigDecimal payoff,
                                      java.math.BigDecimal interests)
        static method to compute amount of capital repaid.
        Parameters:
        payoff - payoff of this loan
        interests - amount of interests for the given period
        Returns:
        amount of capital repaid

      • remainingK

        static java.math.BigDecimal remainingK(java.math.BigDecimal remaining,
                                       java.math.BigDecimal principal)
        static method to compute the remaining capital to be repaid.
        Parameters:
        remaining - capital to be repaid
        principal - amount of capital repaid for this payment
        Returns:
        amount of remaining capital to be repaid

      • insurance

        static java.math.BigDecimal insurance(java.math.BigDecimal capital,
                                      java.math.BigDecimal rate,
                                      long duration)
        static method to compute amount of insurance for this payment.
        Parameters:
        capital - amount of the loan on which to calculate the insurance contribution
        rate - interest rate of the insurance
        duration - duration of the loan in years
        Returns:
        amount of insurance for this payment

      • totalCost

        static java.math.BigDecimal totalCost(java.math.BigDecimal payoff,
                                      java.math.BigDecimal insurance)
        static method to compute total cost of this payment (amount of capital repaid + interest + insurance contribution)
        Parameters:
        payoff - payoff for this loan (remaining capital to be repaid * rate / duration)
        insurance - amount of insurance contribution for this payment
        Returns:
        total cost for this payment
